text: Welcome to your first day as my assistant.
I know you must be nervous considering this is your first day, but don't sweat it!
Let me show you the ropes.
I'm doing the hard work and your job is to pass me the correct mix of substances.
I'm pretty clumsy and always forget where I put the substances.
--Also, my mother sometimes does the cleaning..
Your job is to find them and create a new substance.
Place found substances on the table and mix them. Then bring the finished product to me.
In order to make things easier, I went out of my way and already found the substances for you.
Now you just need to mix them, Good luck!
